latest.title: Further re: Winding-Up Petition
latest.content:
19 Dec 2024 11:35
RNS Number : 7902Q
Hellenic Dynamics PLC
19 December 2024
19 December 2024
Hellenic Dynamics plc
("Hellenic Dynamics" or the "Company")
Winding-Up Petition
Hellenic Dynamics plc (LSE: HELD), a medical cannabis cultivator focused on producing medical cannabis flowers for global markets announces that further to the announcement on 26 November 2024, the hearing for the winding-up petition, which was to be held on 18 December 2024, has been adjourned until 14 February 2025 because of the petitioner's failure to serve his petition in the correct manner.
The Directors do not believe that the Company is responsible for re-imbursing the petitioner for the losses that he is claiming given he is not a trade creditor of the Company and is looking to recover, from the Company, losses that he suffered by reason of speculative trading of its shares.
The Company will update the market further when it is able to do so.
The Directors of the Company take responsibility for this announcement.
Enquires:
Hellenic Dynamics Plc
Davinder Rai
+44 (0)20 3818 7850
info@hellenicdynamics.com
Cairn Financial Advisers LLP
Emily Staples / Jo Turner
+44 (0)20 7213 0880
Peterhouse Capital - Brokers
Lucy Williams / Charles Goodfellow
+44 (0)20 7469 0930

latest.title: Winding-Up Petition
latest.content:
1 Aug 2024 13:10
RNS Number : 8379Y
Hellenic Dynamics PLC
01 August 2024
1 August 2024
Hellenic Dynamics Plc
("Hellenic" or the "Company")
Winding-Up Petition
Hellenic Dynamics plc (LSE: HELD), a medical cannabis cultivator with a dedicated focus on producing tetrahydrocannabinol ("THC") dominant strains of medical cannabis flowers for the fast-growing global medical cannabis markets, operating a 40,000 square meter cultivation licence from its 195,506 square meter facility in Northern Greece, announces that it has today received a copy of a winding-up petition brought against it by Hill Dickinson LLP, the Company's legal advisers, in relation to debts owed by the Company of £85,058.83 (plus interest which has been accruing at a daily rate of £21.29 since the date of the winding-up petition) ("Petition"). The Petition which has been brought pursuant to section 122(1)(f) of the Insolvency Act 1986 is dated 16 July 2024. The Petition has been filed with the court and the Company's hearing date is scheduled for 28 August 2024.
The Company has been informed that in order to prevent this action it must make payment in full immediately, so the court proceedings can be withdrawn and all action ceased. Until such payment is received proceedings will continue accordingly.
In order to be in a position to make full payment the Company is relying on receipt of the €1 million long-term loan announced on 22 April 2024 which is now due by mid-August 2024 and before the scheduled court hearing date of 28 August 2024.
The Company is in contact with Hill Dickinson LLP and Wedlake Bell LLP (solicitors to Hill Dickinson LLP in relation to this matter) regarding the Petition and will update the market in due course.
The information contained within this announcement is deemed to constitute inside information as stipulated under Article 7 of EU Regulation 596/2014 (which forms part of domestic UK law pursuant to the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018) . Upon the publication of this announcement, this inside information is now considered to be in the public domain.
The Directors of the Company accept responsibility for the content of this announcement.
Enquires:
Hellenic Dynamics Plc
+44 (0)20 3818 7850
Davinder Rai info@hellenicdynamics.com
Cairn Financial Advisers LLP
Emily Staples / Jo Turner +44 (0)20 7213 0880
Peterhouse Capital - Brokers
Lucy Williams / Charles Goodfellow +44 (0)20 7469 0930
This information is provided by RNS, the news service of the London Stock Exchange. RNS is approved by the Financial Conduct Authority to act as a Primary Information Provider in the United Kingdom.
